description:
Dr. Barbara Lavi presents an hour-long Goal Setting Theory: How to Achieve Your Goals course that will put you on track to achieving your dreams.

After taking a short quiz to find where your strengths and weaknesses lie in your ability to dream, you will learn to overcome the any blockades on your path to dreaming. Then, with the advice and guidance of Dr. Lavi, you will design a personalized plan to achieving your dreams that you can work on immediately.

Along with the 18 short video lessons that this course is composed of, you will be provided with several PDF assignments to work on in between videos.

The Goal Setting Theory: How to Achieve Your Goals course will take about an hour to complete not including the time you spend on the assignments, quizzes, or dream plan (how much time you spend is up to you!)

Take this Goal Setting Theory course if you feel mentally stuck, feel unsure about where you are or where you're going, or just need a way to get back on the path to your dreams!

Take this ultimate Goal Setting Theory right now and learn how to achieve your goals.

</p>
title: Jumpstart Your Life In An Hour
